TypeSignature.Value: public class Trigger : System.Windows.TriggerBase, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Trigger extends System.Windows.TriggerBase implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Trigger Inherits TriggerBase Implements IAddChild, ISupportInitialize
public ref class Trigger : System::Windows::TriggerBase, System::ComponentModel::ISupportInitialize, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type Trigger = class inherit TriggerBase interface IAddChild interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示一个触发器，它按条件应用属性值或执行操作。

span.span: Represents a trigger that applies property values or performs actions conditionally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 定义属性对应于最终用户操作，如属性设置为`true`当用户悬停光标或相应属性。 defines properties that correspond to end-user actions, such as the property that is set to `true` when the user hovers the cursor over a or the corresponding property of a . 表示属性值中的最终用户操作以及元素，允许[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]样式来更改属性值根据这些最终用户的操作，一切都是通过标记内。Representing end-user actions in property values, along with the element, allows [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] styles to change property values based on those end-user actions, all from within markup. 当不再满足触发的条件时由触发器更改的属性是自动能重置为其以前的值。The properties changed by triggers are automatically reset to their previous value when the triggered condition is no longer satisfied. 触发器进行了优化针对瞬态的希望变化并返回到原始状态，如上并上。Triggers are optimized for transient states which are expected to change and return to original state, such as on and on . 感兴趣的必须是依赖项属性。The of interest must be a dependency property. 请注意，必须指定这两并上的属性触发器才有意义的。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the trigger to be meaningful. 如果未设置的一个或两个属性，将引发异常。If one or both of the properties are not set, an exception is thrown. 的属性只能包含对象对象。The property of a object can only consist of objects. 添加子级对象隐式地将其添加到为对象。Adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 不支持对象;仅支持对象。 objects are not supported; only supports objects. 有其他类型的触发器。There are other types of triggers. 可以应用基于多个属性状态的更改。 allows you to apply changes based on the state of multiple properties. 可以在事件发生时应用更改。 allows you to apply changes when an event occurs. 和用于数据绑定属性。 and are for data-bound properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个已命名供控件。The following example shows a named available to controls. 定义用于更改元素的按钮的属性时属性是`true`。The defines a element that changes the property of a button when the property is `true`. [!code-xaml[BtnStyles#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BtnStyles/CS/app.xaml#2)]

related.span: 样式设置和模板化示例简介

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::DependencyProperty ^ Property { System::Windows::DependencyProperty ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::DependencyProperty ^ value); };
member this.Property : System.Windows.DependencyProperty with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个属性，该属性返回要与触发器的 属性进行比较的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the property that returns the value that is compared with the property of the trigger.

summary.span: 该比较是一项引用相等性检查。

span.span: The comparison is a reference equality check.

value.span: 一个 ，它返回元素的属性值。

span.span: A that returns the property value of the element.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值与指定的值进行比较属性。The value returned by this property is compared with the value specified by the property. 已执行的比较是引用相等性检查。The comparison that is performed is a reference equality check. 如果两个值匹配，则关联将应用指定的属性值。If the two values match, then the associated s apply the specified property values. 使用`ClassName.PropertyName`语法来限定的属性指定是否样式或模板，其中包含此触发器不具有`TargetType`属性集。Use the `ClassName.PropertyName` syntax to qualify the property you are specifying if the style or template that contains this trigger does not have the `TargetType` property set. 请注意，必须指定这两并上的属性触发器才有意义的。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the trigger to be meaningful. 如果未设置的一个或两个属性，将引发异常。If one or both of the properties are not set, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例包含两个触发器。The following example contains two triggers. 第一台的属性时属性是**true**。The first changes the property of a when the property is **true**. 第二个更改按钮的属性时属性是**true**。The second changes the property of a button when the property is **true**. 的设置为因此也就无需限定`Property`带类名的属性。The of the is set to and therefore there is no need to qualify the `Property` properties with the class name. [!code-xaml[BtnStyles#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BtnStyles/CS/app.xaml#2)]

exception.span: 不能包含引用 属性的 。

span.span: A cannot contain a that refers to the property.

exception.span: 使用 之后，就不能再对其进行修改。

span.span: After a is in use, it cannot be modified.

Public Shared Sub ReceiveTypeConverter (targetObject As Object, eventArgs As XamlSetTypeConverterEventArgs)

param.name: targetObject
param.span: 类型转换器在其中设置值的对象。

span.span: The object where the type converter sets the value.

param.name: eventArgs
param.span: 与类型转换器处理有关的数据。

span.span: Data that is relevant for type converter processing.

summary.span: 处理类型转换器为 对象的属性提供值的情况。

span.span: Handles cases where a type converter provides a value for a property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是应用所引用的方法特性在类级别，这意味着，此方法将处理所有设置的值的尝试与类型转换器。This is the method referenced by an applied attribute at the class level, which means that this method processes all attempts to set values of with a type converter. 您不通常直接调用此方法。You do not typically call this method directly.

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象描述当满足指定条件时要应用的属性值。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects, which describe the property values to apply when the specified condition has been met.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ZeroOrMoreSetters**ZeroOrMoreSetters* 零个或多对象。Zero or more objects. 它不支持对象。This does not support object. 一个，可使用来应用属性值在该元素满足指定的条件时。A allows you to use s to apply property values when the element meets a specified condition. 例如，你可能想要更改元素的背景色，当它处于焦点时。For example, you may want to change the background color of an element when it is in focus. 如果超过一次设置同一属性，将应用的最后一个属性值。If the same property is set more than once, the last property value will be applied. 的属性只能包含对象对象。The property of a object can only consist of objects. 添加子级对象隐式地将其添加到为对象。Adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 不支持对象;仅支持对象。 objects are not supported; only supports objects. ## Examples 如上所述，添加子级对象隐式地将其添加到为对象。As mentioned above, adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 在以下示例中，``是隐式的。In the following example, `` is implicit. [!code-xaml[PhotoStoreDemoStyled#TriggerSettersRef](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PhotoStoreDemoStyled/CS/window1.xaml#triggersettersref)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对象的名称，该对象具有可应用关联的 setter 的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the object with the property that causes the associated setters to be applied.
The default property is .

value.span: 如果此属性为 ，则根据此样式或模板所应用于的元素（样式化父级或模板化父级）计算 属性。

span.span: If this property is , then the property is evaluated with respect to the element this style or template is being applied to (the styled parent or the templated parent).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性设置的范围内的任意元素的名称为触发器集合 (集合，此属于) 应用。You can set this property to the name of any element within the scope of where the trigger collection (the collection that this is part of) is applied. 这通常是包含此模板内的已命名的元素。This is typically a named element that is within the template that contains this . 您可以命名对象使用[X:name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)语法。You can name an object using the [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) syntax. ## Examples 一种方案需要使用感兴趣的属性不是模板化父级，如以下示例所示的属性时，属性：One scenario when you would use the property is when the property of interest is not a property of the templated parent, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[ControlTemplateExamples#TriggerSourceName](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlTemplateExamples/CS/resources/menu.xaml#triggersourcename)]

exception.span: 使用 之后，就不能再对其进行修改。

summary.span: 获取或设置要与元素的属性值进行比较的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value to be compared with the property value of the element.

summary.span: 该比较是一项引用相等性检查。

span.span: The comparison is a reference equality check.
The default value is .
See also the Exceptions section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值与返回的属性值进行比较属性的。This value is compared with the property value returned by the property of the . 已执行的比较是引用质量检查。The comparison that is performed is a reference quality check. 如果两个值相等，则关联将应用指定的属性值。If the two values are equal, then the associated s apply the specified property values. 请注意，必须指定这两并上的属性触发器才有意义的。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the trigger to be meaningful. 因此，如果未指定一个或两个属性，将引发异常。Therefore, if one or both of the properties are not specified, then an exception is thrown. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例更改按钮的属性时属性是**true**。The following example changes the property of a button when the property is **true**. [!code-xaml[BtnStyles#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BtnStyles/CS/app.xaml#2)]
